summary_teim: End of the first Rock and Roll Hall of Fame induction, with jam led by Jerry Lee Lewis and inductees, presenters, and Paul Shaffer's house band. Featuring: Julian Lennon, Sean Lennon, Keith Richards, Everly Brothers, John Fogerty, Steve Winwood, Neil Young, David Sanborn.
summary_ssm: End of the first Rock and Roll Hall of Fame induction, with jam led by Jerry Lee Lewis and inductees, presenters, and Paul Shaffer's house band. Featuring: Julian Lennon, Sean Lennon, Keith Richards, Everly Brothers, John Fogerty, Steve Winwood, Neil Young, David Sanborn.
contents_teim: Inductees and speakers perform Little queenie; Gimme some lovin'; Matchbox blues; Proud Mary -- Bill Graham thanks musicians -- Jan Wenner and Ahmet Ertegun thank audience.

abstract_ssm:
This is footage from the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame induction ceremony on January 23, 1986. Julian Lennon, Neil Young, Billy Joel, Jerry Lee Lewis, Chuck Berry, Keith Richards, Sean Lennon, John Fogerty, Steve Winwood, and Paul Shaffer perform "Little Queenie" -- Julian Lennon, Neil Young, Billy Joel, Jerry Lee Lewis, Chuck Berry, Keith Richards, Sean Lennon, John Fogerty, Ron Wood, Steve Winwood, and Paul Shaffer perform "Gimme Some Lovin'" -- 
Julian Lennon, Jerry Lee Lewis, Chuck Berry, Keith Richards, Sean Lennon, John Fogerty, Ron Wood, Steve Winwood, and Paul Shaffer perform "Matchbox Blues" -- Julian Lennon, Jerry Lee Lewis, Chuck Berry, Keith Richards, Sean Lennon, John Fogerty, Ron Wood, Steve Winwood, and Paul Shaffer perform "Proud Mary" -- Bill Graham thanks musicians -- Jan Wenner and Ahmet Ertegun say goodnight
name_sim: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation
